articles.image_title: December 22, 2022, Minneapolis, Minnesota, USA: A pedestrian walks down Nicollet Mall while high winds kick up snow in downtown Minneapolis. The Twin Cities saw 8 inches of snow Wednesday followed by wind gusts up to 50mph and windchills reaching -35 degrees F on Thursday and Friday. A powerful Arctic winter storm is making its way through the US and parts of Canada, bringing with it frigid temperatures and flight delays ahead of the busiest travel days of the year.
